item.title: A Love Letter to Kate Bush
item.description: Kate on her first tour I discovered Kate Bush on yet another of my late night TV Tropes binges. I was looking to see if harsh vocals existed outside of metal when I came upon a description of Waking the Witch : “Kate Bush used it in 1985 with “Waking The Witch”. In this case, she provided both voices: one track is her natural voice, the other is a drastically slowed down demonic growl.
